name: The Promethium Effect - The Idle Clicker MMO
description: Your job as head of the corporation is to take on the role of manager, pirate, and bounty hunter. All for the growth of the corporation. Protect your assets, steal from the weak, post bounties and pay others to do your dirty work to get ahead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 211 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 211 MB available space
